title: Unspoken Truths of Sexual Attraction | Relationship Theory
description: In this week’s episode of Relationship Theory,  Tom and Lisa talk about the real root of attraction and why it’s necessary for any successful relationship.   Subscribe to Women of Impact podcast here: https://apple.co/2oT9GPQ   This episode is sponsored by Winc!
